item.title: Cryptocurrency and Blockchain
item.description: Introduction Cryptocurrency and Blockchain are two terms that have been buzzing around the internet for the past few years. They are both related to each other and have caused a significant impact on the world of finance and technology. In this blog post, we will be discussing the basics of Cryptocurrency and Blockchain. What is Cryptocurrency? Cryptocurrency is a digital or virtual currency that uses cryptography for security. It operates independently of a central bank and uses decentralized technology for secure transactions.
